General.Name: Kits Eyecare Ltd
General.Description: Kits Eyecare Ltd. operates a digital eyecare platform in the United States and Canada. The company manufactures progressive and contact lenses, eyeglasses, and frames under the KITS brand, as well as distributes eyewear products of various brands. It operates through a network of optical e-commerce websites, including KITS.com, KITS.ca, OptiContacts.com, and ContactsExpress.ca. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 510 Seymour Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 3J5

1.Name: Ms. Sabrina  Liak
